info.description: 进销存系统后端 API - 基于 DDD 设计的库存管理系统
info.title: ERP Backend API

get.description: Retrieve products belonging to a specific category
Retrieve a paginated list of products with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new product in the catalog

get.description: Retrieve a product by its code
Get the count of products grouped by status
Retrieve a product by its ID

post.description: Activate an inactive product
Deactivate an active product
Discontinue a product (cannot be reactivated)
Check if a specific quantity is available for a product in a warehouse

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of inventory items with optional filtering
Retrieve inventory items that are below their minimum threshold (low stock alerts)
Retrieve inventory for a specific warehouse-product combination
get.summary: Get inventory by warehouse and product

get.description: Retrieve an inventory item by its ID
Retrieve transactions for a specific inventory item
Retrieve all active (unexpired, unreleased) locks for an inventory item
Retrieve a specific stock lock by ID
Retrieve inventory items for a specific product across all warehouses

post.description: Adjust stock to match actual quantity (stock count/adjustment)
Deduct locked stock (actual shipment/consumption)
Increase stock for a product in a warehouse (e.g., purchase receiving, returns)
Lock stock for a pending order (reserve inventory)
Release previously locked stock back to available (e.g., order cancelled)

put.description: Set min/max quantity thresholds for inventory alerts

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of inventory transactions with optional filtering
Retrieve a specific inventory transaction by ID
Retrieve inventory items for a specific warehouse
Retrieve a paginated list of customers with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new customer in the partner module

get.description: Retrieve a customer by its code
Get the count of customers grouped by status
Retrieve a customer by its ID

post.description: Activate an inactive or suspended customer
Add to a customer's prepaid balance
Deduct from a customer's prepaid balance
Deactivate an active customer
Suspend an active customer

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of suppliers with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new supplier in the partner module

get.description: Retrieve a supplier by its code
Get the count of suppliers grouped by status
Retrieve a supplier by its ID

post.description: Activate an inactive or blocked supplier
Block a supplier from doing business
Deactivate an active supplier

put.description: Set a supplier's credit days and credit limit

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of warehouses with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new warehouse in the partner module

get.description: Retrieve a warehouse by its code
Retrieve the default warehouse for the tenant
Get the count of warehouses grouped by status
Retrieve a warehouse by its ID

delete.description: Delete a warehouse by ID (cannot delete default warehouse)

post.description: Disable an active warehouse
Enable an inactive warehouse
Set a warehouse as the default warehouse

get.description: Returns basic system information including version and uptime
Simple ping endpoint to check if the API is responsive

handler.AdjustStockRequest.description: Request body for stock count adjustment

handler.CheckAvailabilityRequest.description: Request body for checking if a quantity is available

handler.CheckAvailabilityResponse.description: Response indicating if requested quantity is available

handler.CreateCustomerRequest.description: Request body for creating a new customer

handler.CreateProductRequest.description: Request body for creating a new product

description.example: This is a sample product description

handler.CreateSupplierRequest.description: Request body for creating a new supplier

handler.CreateWarehouseRequest.description: Request body for creating a new warehouse

handler.CustomerListResponse.description: Customer list item with basic information

handler.CustomerResponse.description: Customer details returned by the API

handler.DeductStockRequest.description: Request body for consuming locked stock (shipment/fulfillment)

handler.InventoryItemResponse.description: Inventory item response with stock quantities and cost information

handler.LockStockRequest.description: Request body for locking stock for a pending order

handler.ProductListResponse.description: Product list item with basic information

handler.ProductResponse.description: Product details returned by the API

description.example: This is a sample product description

handler.SetLevelRequest.description: Request body for setting customer level

handler.SetPaymentTermsRequest.description: Request body for setting supplier payment terms

handler.SetRatingRequest.description: Request body for setting supplier rating

handler.SetThresholdsRequest.description: Request body for setting inventory alert thresholds

handler.SupplierListResponse.description: Supplier list item with basic information

handler.SupplierResponse.description: Supplier details returned by the API

handler.TransactionResponse.description: Inventory transaction record for audit trail

handler.UnlockStockRequest.description: Request body for releasing locked stock

handler.UpdateCustomerCodeRequest.description: Request body for updating a customer's code

handler.UpdateCustomerRequest.description: Request body for updating a customer

handler.UpdateProductCodeRequest.description: Request body for updating a product's code

handler.UpdateProductRequest.description: Request body for updating a product

handler.UpdateSupplierCodeRequest.description: Request body for updating a supplier's code

handler.UpdateSupplierRequest.description: Request body for updating a supplier

handler.UpdateWarehouseCodeRequest.description: Request body for updating a warehouse's code

handler.UpdateWarehouseRequest.description: Request body for updating a warehouse

handler.WarehouseListResponse.description: Warehouse list item with basic information

handler.WarehouseResponse.description: Warehouse details returned by the API
